name: aegis-unified
description: Aegis - Unified Security Oracle with Frontend and Smart Contracts

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:oracle" "npm run dev:hardhat"
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:oracle & npm run start:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:contracts
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install && cd ../oracle && npm install

author: Aegis Team
